map-carousel.1.0.0: Initial release with interactive map and location cards
map-carousel.1.1.0: Made image and price fields optional in Location interface

map-carousel.1.2.2: Updated Props interface with decorative header and sub-parameter JSDoc documentation
map-carousel.1.2.3: Fixed defensive property access to handle empty objects and null values

event-card.1.0.0: Initial release with default, compact, horizontal and covered variants. Supports physical, online, and hybrid events with signals and vibe tags.
event-card.2.0.0: BREAKING: Simplified Event interface - replaced startDateTime/endDateTime with display-formatted dateTime string, removed image/locationType/onlineUrl, changed ticketTiers to string array
event-card.3.0.0: Added image support to Event type and default variant for displaying cover images.
event-card.4.0.0: BREAKING: Removed View button from all variants. Entire card is now clickable.
event-card.4.1.0: Added image display to horizontal (list) and compact (carousel) variants
event-card.5.0.0: BREAKING: Removed id from Event interface. Use array index for key.
event-card.5.0.1: Added accessibility support with role, tabIndex, keyboard handlers, and aria-label for all card variants
event-card.5.0.2: Moved demo data to separate file for cleaner component code
event-card.5.0.4: Updated Props interface with decorative header and sub-parameter JSDoc documentation
event-card.5.0.5: Fixed defensive property access to handle empty objects and null values
event-card.5.0.6: Added types.ts to registry for proper installation

event-list.1.0.0: Initial release with grid, list and carousel layouts. Includes pagination support.
event-list.2.0.0: BREAKING: Updated to use simplified Event interface with display-formatted dateTime
event-list.3.0.0: Updated grid variant to show 3 cards with images and View More button. Added onViewMore action.
event-list.4.0.0: BREAKING: Added fullwidth variant with split-screen map layout. Updated to 15 events. Added coordinates to Event type.
event-list.5.0.0: BREAKING: Fullwidth is no longer a variant - use fullscreenComponent instead. Map now uses real Leaflet.
event-list.5.1.0: Added animated filter panel with Category, Date, Neighborhood, Price, and Format filters. Filters apply to both list and map markers.
event-list.5.2.0: Added expand button next to title in list and carousel variants with onExpand action
event-list.5.2.1: Fixed event-card dependency resolution for shadcn CLI installation
event-list.6.0.0: BREAKING: Removed id from Event interface. Use array index for selection and key.
event-list.6.0.1: Added aria-labels to navigation buttons, carousel dots, filter close, and expand buttons for accessibility
event-list.6.0.2: Moved demo data to separate file for cleaner component code
event-list.6.0.4: Removed Next.js dependency - now uses React-only lazy loading for map components
event-list.6.0.5: Updated Props interface with decorative header and sub-parameter JSDoc documentation
event-list.6.0.6: Fixed defensive property access to handle empty objects and null values
event-list.6.0.7: Added types.ts to registry for proper installation

event-detail.1.0.0: Initial release with image carousel, organizer info, location, policies, FAQs, and ticket purchase.
event-detail.2.0.0: BREAKING: Updated to use simplified Event interface with display-formatted dateTime and string ticketTiers
event-detail.2.1.0: Moved Get Tickets CTA from sticky bottom to end of content for fullscreen mode.
event-detail.2.2.0: Changed CTA buttons and map tooltip from orange to dark theme colors
event-detail.3.0.0: BREAKING: Removed id from EventDetails, Organizer, and tier interfaces. Use array index for key.
event-detail.3.0.1: Added aria-labels to image navigation, share, save, and back buttons for accessibility
event-detail.3.0.2: Moved demo data to separate file for cleaner component code
event-detail.3.0.4: Removed Next.js dependency - now uses React-only lazy loading for map components
event-detail.3.0.5: Updated Props interface with decorative header and sub-parameter JSDoc documentation
event-detail.3.0.6: Fixed defensive property access to handle empty objects and null values
event-detail.3.0.7: Added types.ts to registry for proper installation

ticket-tier-select.1.0.0: Initial release with ticket tier cards, quantity controls, price breakdown, and order summary sidebar
ticket-tier-select.1.1.0: Added optional event image above order summary. Order summary now always visible with fixed width.
ticket-tier-select.2.0.0: BREAKING: Refactored to use nested event object (event.title, event.date, event.image, event.currency) instead of flat props
ticket-tier-select.2.0.3: Updated Props interface with decorative header and sub-parameter JSDoc documentation
ticket-tier-select.3.0.0: BREAKING: Removed id from TicketTier interface, made name and price optional.
